name: The Adventures of Emily
description:
The Adventures of Emily is a 3rd person adventure-puzzle game mainly inspired by the classic bedtime stories for children. In The Adventures of Emily, each chapter and level looks and feels different, inheriting and reflecting several elements from the stories. Gameplay and narrative is designed to work together to immerse the player in the game world by increasing engagement and creating a game flow.

Emily is a young and rather reckless girl who lives with her parents. She is known for her interest in fairy tales since she was little. Even though some of her friends make fun of her, Emily never cares about it, and she would never mind people who doesn’t like fairy tales. She believes in magic and sometimes talks to her toys.

Emily's most precious belonging is her pillow. Because her favorite time of the day is when she sleeps; dreams are the place that Emily can feel like she lives in fairy tales for real. So her pillow is with her every time, it is the closest to her in all her dreams, and Emily sees him as her best friend. Although her family worries about this situation, they think that such things might be normal since Emily is a little girl.


Join Emily and take a part in this adventure!
